channel.title: Making say im owner..?
channel.description:
when I log in it currently says: james has logged in, but how do i make it say [owner] James has logged in?
could someone just give me a quick way of how to do it.
Many Thanks Jamesx

item.title: Making say im owner..?
item.dc:creator: @Liam123 Liam123
item.description:
@Liam123 wrote:

}
if (playerName.startsWith("james") {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = Owner " playerName+": Has Just Logged In: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + ".";
}

Search for “Has Logged In”

add it underneath the last } of that code.

Read full topic
